trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardDesigner" /> class.
Gets the action list collection for the control designer.

An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> object that contains the custom <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> items for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> objeto que contém a custom <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> itens para o designer de controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> object containing the regions to add.
Adds the provided designer region collection to the current designer regions.
Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object.
Creates a navigation template from the active step and saves it in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate" /> property of the active step.
A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the operation.
The wizard control associated with this designer.
The name of the template to convert to.
An array of IDs for the controls that are to be included in the template.
Converts a selection of controls to a template in the associated control.
Creates the child controls of the associated control.
Gets or sets a property in the associated wizard control indicating whether to display a sidebar.
<see langword="true" /> to display the sidebar; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Para exibir a barra lateral; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
A collection of control designer regions for the associated control.
Retrieves the HTML markup to display the control and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, including all control designer regions.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object.
Gets the content for the editable region of the control at design time.
The persisted content for the region, if the control designer supports editable regions; otherwise, an empty string ("").
<paramref name="region" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="region" /> is not an object of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" />.
Use base
Initializes the designer with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> object.
Use base
Called by the design host when the user clicks the associated control at design time.
The source of the event.
The event data.
Called when the associated control changes.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when a property of the associated control is changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método é chamado quando uma propriedade do controle associado é alterada.

trans-unit.source: This lets you perform any processing that is required after a property change.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite executar qualquer processamento necessário após uma alteração de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> method to provide additional processing before you persist the control and before you refresh the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> método para fornecer processamento adicional antes de você manter o controle e antes de atualizar a marcação HTML de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: When you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, make sure that you call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> método em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de que você chamar o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> método para a classe base para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> object containing the properties for the class of the component.
Adds properties to or removes properties from the Properties grid in a design host, or provides new design-time settings or properties that correspond to properties on the associated control.
A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the operation.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control associated with this designer.
The name of the template to reset.
Resets the specified template to its default value.
An editable design region contained within the control.
The content to assign for the editable design region.
Specifies the content for an editable region of the control at design time.
<paramref name="region" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="region" /> is not an object of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" />.
Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> object.
Gets a value indicating whether the design host should use a preview control.
<see langword="true" /> to use a preview control; <see langword="false" /> to use the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Para usar um controle de visualização; <see langword="false" /> para usar o controle associado.
